name: Thrash
summary: You thrash the grabbed foe around.
description:
You thrash the grabbed foe around. It takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your weapon specialization damage plus your Rage damage. The foe must attempt a basic Fortitude save against your class DC.Thrash Leads To...

Collateral ThrashTraitsRage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
